name: Ice Cream Runner (Kathan Sahu)
description:
Our game is a 2D platformer action game. The name of the character is Sade he is a 12 yrs. old boy who is fond of ice-cream but due to lockdown he is not able to eat the ice-cream. In this game he will try to reach to the ice-cream shop. In this game there are also powerups like:

1) Chocolate Bar

2) Bottled Drink
